Function# vm_map_64

macOS 10.0+

```
kern_return_t vm_map_64(vm_map_t target_task, vm_address_t *address, vm_size_t size, vm_address_t mask, int flags, mem_entry_name_port_t object, memory_object_offset_t offset, boolean_t copy, vm_prot_t cur_protection, vm_prot_t max_protection, vm_inherit_t inheritance);
```
